flavor_text_entries.black:
Litwick shines a light that absorbs the
life energy of people and Pokémon,
which becomes the fuel that it burns.
flavor_text_entries.white:
While shining a light and pretending
to be a guide, it leeches off the life
force of any who follow it.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Its flame is usually out, but it starts
shining when it absorbs life force
from people or Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Its flame is usually out, but it starts
shining when it absorbs life force
from people or Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.x:
While shining a light and pretending to be a guide,
it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of

flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
While shining a light and pretending to be a guide,

flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of
people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that
it burns.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
The flame on its head keeps its body slightly
warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the
hand to guide them to the spirit world.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs,
the brighter and eerier the flame on its
head burns.
